verses.verse: Come <S%H3212><s%>, and let us return <S%H7725><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>: for he hath torn <S%H2963><s%>, and he will heal <S%H7495><s%> us; he hath smitten <S%H5221><s%>, and he will bind us up <S%H2280><s%>.

After two days <S%H3117><s%> will he revive <S%H2421><s%> us: in the third <S%H7992><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> he will raise us up <S%H6965><s%>, and we shall live <S%H2421><s%> in his sight <S%H6440><s%>.

Then shall we know <S%H3045><s%>, if we follow <S%H7291><s%> on to know <S%H3045><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>: his going forth <S%H4161><s%> is prepared <S%H3559><s%> as the morning <S%H7837><s%>; and he shall come <S%H935><s%> unto us as the rain <S%H1653><s%>, as the latter <S%H4456><s%> and former rain <S%H3384><s%> unto the earth <S%H776><s%>.

O Ephraim <S%H669><s%>, what shall I do <S%H6213><s%> unto thee? O Judah <S%H3063><s%>, what shall I do <S%H6213><s%> unto thee? for your goodness <S%H2617><s%> is as a morning <S%H1242><s%> cloud <S%H6051><s%>, and as the early <S%H7925><s%> dew <S%H2919><s%> it goeth away <S%H1980><s%>. goodness: or, mercy, or, kindness

Therefore have I hewed <S%H2672><s%> them by the prophets <S%H5030><s%>; I have slain <S%H2026><s%> them by the words <S%H561><s%> of my mouth <S%H6310><s%>: and thy judgments <S%H4941><s%> are as the light <S%H216><s%> that goeth forth <S%H3318><s%>. and: or, that thy judgments might be, etc
For I desired <S%H2654><s%> mercy <S%H2617><s%>, and not sacrifice <S%H2077><s%>; and the knowledge <S%H1847><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> more than burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%>.
But they like men <S%H120><s%> have transgressed <S%H5674><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%>: there have they dealt treacherously <S%H898><s%> against me. men: or, Adam
Gilead <S%H1568><s%> is a city <S%H7151><s%> of them that work <S%H6466><s%> iniquity <S%H205><s%>, and is polluted <S%H6121><s%> with blood <S%H1818><s%>. polluted: or, cunning for

And as troops <S%H1416><s%> of robbers wait <S%H2442><s%> for a man <S%H376><s%>, so the company <S%H2267><s%> of priests <S%H3548><s%> murder <S%H7523><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%> by consent <S%H7926><s%> <S%H7927><s%>: for they commit <S%H6213><s%> lewdness <S%H2154><s%>. by: Heb. with one shoulder, or, to Shechem lewdness: or, enormity

I have seen <S%H7200><s%> an horrible thing <S%H8186><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: there is the whoredom <S%H2184><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%>, Israel <S%H3478><s%> is defiled <S%H2930><s%>.
Also, O Judah <S%H3063><s%>, he hath set <S%H7896><s%> an harvest <S%H7105><s%> for thee, when I returned <S%H7725><s%> the captivity <S%H7622><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%>.
